title: Keeper - User Activity
description: This dashboard provides visualizations for user behaviors and admin activities across your organization.

definition.content:
**[Keeper](https://www.keepersecurity.com/)** is a zero-knowledge password management solution that helps organizations securely store, share, and manage credentials across users, devices, and applications.

This dashboard provides visualizations for user behaviors and admin activities across your organization.

For more information, see the [Keeper Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/keeper/).

**Tip**:
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

search.query: source:keeper @evt.name:(login OR login_console OR login_failure OR login_failed_console) $enterprise_id $user_email $ip $event_category $event_name
